data.marketing-index-description: Organize coworking and events on andCards software platform. Real time community directory, search, SMS and push notifications, events, room booking, app integrations, and more.
data.marketing-index-highlight-it-starts-with: Automate your coworking space to save time and earn more
data.marketing-index-highlight-main-subtitle: andCards software will make people love your coworking space: stay longer and easily book facilities.
data.marketing-index-feature-booking-1-descri: Organize your work with andCards all-in-one coworking space management software.
data.marketing-index-feature-booking-2-descri: Automate meeting room booking system with IoT smart locks.
data.marketing-index-feature-booking-3-descri: Increase coworking space utilization and reduce costs by analyzing usage statistics.
data.marketing-index-feature-coworking-direct: Build a business network for your coworking space residents.
Let coworkers easily discover each other through instant search and member directory.
Increase customer retention: people like to hang around their friends.
Communicate to your residents efficiently using push notifications instead of emails.
data.marketing-index-feature-effective-space-: Focus on more important tasks: while andCards automates your coworking space.
data.marketing-index-feature-event-1-descript: Easily promote your events to all users of andCards at no extra cost.
data.marketing-index-feature-event-2-descript: Invite people and collect RSVP by sharing a simple link.
data.marketing-index-feature-event-3-descript: Improve your future events by analyzing event statistics.
data.marketing-index-feature-event-management: Create events to foster networking at your coworking space.
data.marketing-index-title: andCards: Coworking and Event Management Software
